details.title: The rally starts
details.content:
#WATCH Congress General Secretary for Uttar Pradesh East Priyanka Gandhi Vadra, General Secretary for Uttar Pradesh West Jyotiraditya Scindia and party President Rahul Gandhi, hold roadshow in Lucknow. pic.twitter.com/ipMSlxaJyD

— ANI UP (@ANINewsUP) February 11, 2019

details.title: Ahead of UP rally, Priyanka joins twitter
details.content: "Smt. Priyanka Gandhi Vadra is now on Twitter. You may follow her at @priyankagandhi" read a tweet posted from the Congress' official handle. [READ FULL STORY HERE]

details.title: Posters show up in Lucknow depicting Priyanka as Goddess Durga
details.content: In the poster, Priyanka can be seen sitting atop a tiger in an apparent portrayal of Goddess Durga in her most iconic avatar. A Hindi slogan accompanying the picture reads, “Sister Priyanka Gandhi is the form of Mother Durga”. [READ FULL STORY HERE]

details.title: Priyanka sends message to UP voters
details.content: "I am coming tomorrow to Lucknow to meet all of you. I have hope in my heart that together we will start a new kind of politics, a politics in which all of you will be stakeholders -- my young friends, my sisters and even the weakest person, all their voices will be heard," said Gandhi through the Congress's Shakti App. [READ FULL STORY HERE]

details.title: Congress road show is 'Chor show': UP Minister
details.content: Uttar Pradesh Minister Sidharth Nath Singh on Monday said the people of Lucknow will come to see the faces of those who looted the nation in today's "chor show". "They are calling this roadshow but the BJP sees this as 'Chor machaye shor'. Gandhi-Vadra family is out on bail. They can't hold roadshow but a 'Chor show'. People of Uttar Pradesh, especially Lucknow, will come to see corrupt faces of those who looted Rs 12 Lakh crores of this nation," Singh told ANI.

details.title: Priyanka now has 50,000+ followers of Twitter
details.content: Priyanka who joined Twitter ahead of the UP mega rally has garnered over 50,000 followers in just a few hours.

details.title: Priyanka and Rahul to stop at 37 prominent location to pay tributes to political stalwarts
details.content: 37 locations as welcome spots for the Gandhis who will stop at all the prominent locations along their 15-km route and pay tributes at the statues of several political stalwarts.

details.title: Rafale row takes frontseat in UP rally
details.content:
#Visuals from Congress' roadshow in Lucknow. General Secretary for Uttar Pradesh East Priyanka Gandhi Vadra, General Secretary for Uttar Pradesh West Jyotiraditya Scindia and party President Rahul Gandhi are crossing Transport Nagar pic.twitter.com/MbKZc4fNnF

— ANI UP (@ANINewsUP) February 11, 2019

details.title: Priyanka, Rahul rally crosses Transport Nagar
details.content:
#Visuals from Congress' roadshow in Lucknow. General Secretary for Uttar Pradesh East Priyanka Gandhi Vadra, General Secretary for Uttar Pradesh West Jyotiraditya Scindia and party President Rahul Gandhi are crossing Transport Nagar pic.twitter.com/MbKZc4fNnF

— ANI UP (@ANINewsUP) February 11, 2019

details.title: Top UP Congress leadership accompanying Priyanka
details.content: The raths carrying the Gandhis and Jyotiraditya Scindia are accompanied by over a dozen Congress leaders including UPCC chief Raj Babbar, ex MPs like RPN Singh, Annu Tandon, Jitin Prasada, PL Punia, Rajeev Shukla, and more.

details.title: Congress posters attack PM Modi
details.content: A poster saying: “Ye dushmano ke liye andhi hai, ye nai Indira Gandhi hai” and “aa gayee badlav ki aandhi", "Modi ki Lanka dahan karegi", besides the oft-repeated slogan ‘chowkidaar chor.’

details.title: Here is a brief history on Congress' performance in UP in last five years
details.content: In 2014, Congress could win just two seats of Gandhi bastion —Rae Bareli (Sonia Gandhi) and Amethi (Rahul Gandhi). The last two Lok Sabha byelections in eastern Uttar Pradesh, for the Gorakhpur and Phulpur constituencies, were disastrous for the Congress. Congress candidates managed to fetch only around 19,000 votes each and registered only a 2% vote share in each constituency.

details.title: Priyanka to conduct meetings in the state for next three days
details.content: In the course of the next three days, she is expected to conduct daily meetings over specific constituencies of the 40-odd Lok Sabha seats which fall under her purview.

details.title: More visuals from the mega rally in Lucknow
details.content:
Congress General Secretary for Uttar Pradesh East Priyanka Gandhi Vadra, General Secretary for Uttar Pradesh West Jyotiraditya Scindia and party President Rahul Gandhi, continue their roadshow in Lucknow. pic.twitter.com/9T6xKTjapB

— ANI UP (@ANINewsUP) February 11, 2019

details.title: Husband Robert Vadra wishes Priyanka for her political debut
Robert Vadra, mother to appear before ED in Jaipur in Bikaner land scam probe
details.content: Amid Priyanka's debut rally in Uttar Pradesh, Vadra is expected to make a fresh appearance before the Enforcement Directorate on Tuesday in Jaipur in connection with a probe into an alleged land scam in the Rajasthan's border town of Bikaner, officials said Monday. His mother Maureen is also likely to appear before the central probe agency at about 10 am at its zonal office on Bhawani Singh Road in Jaipur Tuesday.

#WATCH: Congress President Rahul Gandhi, Priyanka Gandhi and Jyotiraditya Scindia sit down to avoid overhanging electrical wires during their roadshow in Lucknow. pic.twitter.com/1lVmDMOyrV

— ANI UP (@ANINewsUP) February 11, 2019

details.title: Poster war between Congress and BJP in the state
details.content: The BJP workers took a jibe at her state visit by putting a flex reading that Congress general secretary is here to rob the state.Their poster had a large smiling picture of Priyanka Gandhi with a caption written in Hindi in big bold fonts, roughly translated to “I am coming here to rob the Uttar Pradesh.” Another poster that is turning heads in the state capital has a large image of Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Anil Ambani hugging each other. This poster outlines the alleged ‘Rafale Scam’ with large captions of ‘Chowkidaar Chor Hai’ written below the image.

details.title: Amid Priyanka's rally, PM Modi attends Akshaya Patra Foundation event in Vrindavan
details.content:
#WATCH: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, CM Yogi Adityanath and Governor Ram Naik serve food to children at "3rd billionth meal" by Akshaya Patra Foundation(works with govt on mid-day meal schemes) in Vrindavan. PM Modi interacts with the students & feeds a student with a spoon pic.twitter.com/itE5LSqQnE

— ANI UP (@ANINewsUP) February 11, 2019

details.title: Scindia calls BJP government at Centre as 'Jumla Sarkar'
details.content:
जन जन की यही पुकार,
अब अलविदा जुमला सरकार।#NayiUmeedNayaDesh pic.twitter.com/wRlzqRzLEQ

— Jyotiraditya Scindia (@JM_Scindia) February 11, 2019

details.title: Rahul Gandhi attacks PM Modi over Rafale scam, says 'Chowkidar Chor Hai'
details.content: The Congress chief also asked the party activists to work hard towards bringing a new government in Uttar Pradesh. He also accused PM Modi of stealing money from Indian Airforce, while talking about the latest media reports on the Rafale fighter jet deal.

details.title: Won't rest until Congress government formed in UP: Rahul
details.content:
Rahul Gandhi in Lucknow: Nation's 'chowkidaar' stole money from Uttar Pradesh, other states, & Air Force. 'Chowkidaar chor hai'. UP is the heart of the country. We'll play on front-foot. Scindia Ji, Priyanka Ji & I won't rest until a govt of Congress' ideology is formed here. pic.twitter.com/Q9skuFruqc

— ANI UP (@ANINewsUP) February 11, 2019

details.title: Here is what Rahul Gandhi said about his Uttar Pradesh goals
details.content: Addressing a small gathering at the road, Rahul Gandhi said Priyanka and Joyotiraditya Scindia were not introduced in Uttar Pradesh keeping 2019 Lok Sabha in mind. "Our main goal is to bring a Congress government to power in UP in 2022,” he claimed. He also added that Congress wanted to bring an impartial government in UP meant for the farmers, youth, women and deprived sections. [READ FULL STORY HERE]

details.title: Rahul and Priyanka pay tribute to Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel
details.content:
Lucknow: Congress General Secretary for Uttar Pradesh East Priyanka Gandhi Vadra & Congress President Rahul Gandhi pay floral tribute to Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel pic.twitter.com/limlEr4kMF

— ANI UP (@ANINewsUP) February 11, 2019

details.title: Rahul Gandhi issues battle call
details.content: The hollow promises of Modi have come to light. Congress workers must fight this battle with issues that concern the youth, farmers. There are no dearth of issues. Congress party will fight to transform UP and the nation: Rahul Gandhi

PM Modi said he wants to be a 'Chowkidar'. The truth has now surfaced that he conducted parallel negotiations in the Rafale deal. The clause that enabled investigation in case of corruption, was waived off by Mr. Modi, says Rahul Gandhi

UP's youth, farmers, Dalits and the poor, all want a progressive government. Everyone has failed on this front, and the only answer to this is to empower grassroot leaders: Rahul Gandhi

 (Photo | UP Congress/ Twitter)
I have given the responsibility of strengthening Congress party in UP to Priyanka and Scindia. The Congress party must form the government in UP: Rahul Gandhi
Rahul Gandhi concludes his address at the PCC office in Lucknow.
Priyanka Gandhi did not deliver a speech today.
